synopsis.text:
Bank of the World's ruthless leader, Cynthia, and international master thief, Lupin, are locked in a high-stakes race to uncover a legendary brooch. This priceless artifact is believed to have granted extraordinary powers to history's most formidable conquerors, leaving an indelible mark on the world. The key to finding this elusive treasure lies in a stolen ring, which Lupin swiped from a New York auction.

Joined by his loyal companions, Jigen, Fujiko, and Goemon, Lupin must outwit not only Cynthia but also her menacing ex-KGB enforcer, Nabikov. As they decipher ancient Mayan riddles and dodge deadly traps, Lupin and his crew find themselves in a desperate struggle against time. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, can they unlock the secrets of the brooch before Cynthia unleashes global chaos? Greed, adventure, and the thirst for power collide in this thrilling escapade.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
